message: It's a pity that Drake's on such a big clunky base, 'cos that's a rad figurine.
http://www.gamersmint.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/logo-uncharted-3.jpg
Collector's edition details: http://uk.ps3.ign.com/articles/117/1172151p1.html
http://ps3media.ign.com/ps3/image/article/117/1172151/uncharted-3-drakes-deception-20110601095923484-000.jpg
Uh oh, our entire E3 demo leaked online: http://yfrog.com/h78ixwqj
HD trailer: http://blog.us.playstation.com/2011/06/06/uncharted-3-drakes-deception-e3-2011-preview/

Oh man.

You know.  This really IS the game to beat.
OMG the water effects!

Ahahahahahaha.  It seems we're not the only ones to have foreseen Drake Kart™.  This is currently near the top of reddit's front page:

http://i.imgur.com/ZHnyV.jpg

Just for the record, I'd totally play an Uncharted Kart. :D 
I actually showed one of my PC gaming buddies Uncharted 2 yesterday and he was extremely impressed with how good it looks. Even I was like damn, yeah, this game still looks amazing.
It's got the codename "Unkarted" internally.
I mean, um, we don't talk about it at all. *cough*

I still think the whole !!SPOILERS!! Nepalese city level culminating in the helicopter battle in the hotel is the best-looking sequence in a current-generation game.  Not to mention, simply one of the best action sequences ever, period.
Personally I'd give it to the entire Tibetan village, culminating in the Convoy chapter.

Here's another fun Reddit pic, titled "Naughty Dog, Green Blue Yellow":

http://i.imgur.com/CgLCc.jpg
Multiplayer beta is live! Don't forget, you have 30 days of free PSN Plus.
Failing that, if anyone's ineligible but wants to play, I have one key to give away.
Downloading the beta now.
*is staying far away*

Neil Burger (director of The Illusionist and Limitless) is now set to replace David O Russel as the director of Uncharted.

http://www.aintitcool.com/node/50289
And here I thought you were going to give us some spoilaz!
So many things.
Kart racing?
A-ha! It's official, Uncharted 3 has "many things"! That's actually a relief, I was worried that it will only have a few or an average amount of things. Thanks for putting my mind at ease.
Comic Con panel: http://content.usatoday.com/communities/gamehunters/post/2011/07/uncharted-3-team-reveals-secret-of-cinematic-styled-success/1
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PTQgF1Igy7Q
Judging by the amount of time @Neilan *isn't* spending on IM and social networks these days, I surmise (and hope) they're busy wrapping this thing up in time…
Oh yes.
Neilan, I'm pretty excited to see your name in the credits :)
I'm waiting on reviews to see if I even buy it, to be honest.
I don't know that it'd be worth playing through THE WHOLE THING just to see his name…
Pah.  You know those professional reviewers have all been bought.
After I shook hands with Neilan in LA last month, I couldn't even see my palm under all the $100 bills.
So Neilan, do all the other Naughty Dog developers pop in to your place over weekends for Rockband as we did?
Oh yeah, the Rock Band parties are just as happening as they were back home.
Only that you can't enjoy some Steers with the session now right?
I'm pretty sure the US has a few good alternatives to Steers. :)
Is Iori invited to your Rock Band sessions?
Don't be ridiculous, I'm not cool enough.

Gamescom '11 Trailer - http://www.eurogamer.net/videos/uncharted-3-airfield-action-gameplay?size=hd 

It's a cut down of the stage demo, which is also available in bad quality elsewhere. If you're a media blackout sort of person, I probably wouldn't watch this one. I'm inclined to think it maybe reveals too much of a stunning gameplay sequence.

Nolan North unboxes the collector's edition:

http://blog.us.playstation.com/2011/08/25/uncharted-3-drakes-deception-collectors-edition-unboxed/

Where's the video of you unboxing the collector's edition?

Side note: Where did this trend of unboxing videos start anyway?
I am actually Nolan North.
That explains everything.
Kyk 'noord' en fok voort?
